get.description: List the dataset owned by the user.

post.description: Add a document to a dataset, in JSON form.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Dataset name.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Fulltext query, using mysql MATCH boolean query format.

parameters.name: metadata_selection
parameters.description: json object of {"metadata_field":["selected_values"]}

parameters.name: time_period
parameters.description: Time period selection

post.description: Delete a document from a dataset.

parameters.name: file_url
parameters.description: Public url pointing to the file (pdf/txt/docx...)

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Specify the filename if different from the url (nucleus guesses the file type from the extension at the end of the url or file name)

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Destination dataset where the file will be inserted.

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: A json containing additional metadata fields relative to the file, eg. {"author":"author name"}

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Destination dataset where the file will be inserted.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Dataset name.

parameters.name: doc_title
parameters.description: The title of the document to retrieve. Example: " "title 1" "

parameters.name: doc_id
parameters.description: The docid of the document to retrieve. Example: "docid1"

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Dataset name.

parameters.name: doc_titles
parameters.description: The title of the documents on which info is requested. Example: " "title 1", "title 2" "

parameters.name: doc_ids
parameters.description: The docid of the documents on which info is requested. Example: "docid1, docid2"

get.description: Recommendation of documents on given topics that have been extracted from a given dataset.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Dataset name.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Fulltext query, using mysql MATCH boolean query format. Example, ("word1" OR "word2") AND ("word3" OR "word4")

parameters.name: custom_stop_words
parameters.description: List of stop words.

parameters.name: num_topics
parameters.description: Number of topics to be extracted from the dataset.

parameters.name: num_keywords
parameters.description: Number of keywords per topic that is extracted from the dataset.

parameters.name: excluded_docs
parameters.description: List of document IDs that should be excluded from the analysis. Example, "docid1, docid2, ..., docidN"

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Dataset name.

parameters.name: custom_stop_words
parameters.description: List of stop words

parameters.name: doc_title
parameters.description: The title of the document to be summarized.

parameters.name: summary_length
parameters.description: The maximum number of bullet points a user wants to see in the document summary.

parameters.name: context_amount
parameters.description: The number of sentences surrounding key summary sentences in the documents that they come from.

get.description: Get topic consensus for topics extracted from a given dataset.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Dataset name.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Fulltext query, using mysql MATCH boolean query format. Example, ("word1" OR "word2") AND ("word3" OR "word4")

parameters.name: custom_stop_words
parameters.description: List of stop words

parameters.name: num_topics
parameters.description: Number of topics to be extracted from the dataset.

parameters.name: num_keywords
parameters.description: Number of keywords per topic that is extracted from the dataset.

parameters.name: excluded_docs
parameters.description: List of document IDs that should be excluded from the analysis. Example, "docid1, docid2, ..., docidN"

get.description: Get topic sentiment for topics extracted from a given dataset.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Dataset name.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Fulltext query, using mysql MATCH boolean query format. Example, ("word1" OR "word2") AND ("word3" OR "word4")

parameters.name: custom_stop_words
parameters.description: List of stop words

parameters.name: num_topics
parameters.description: Number of topics to be extracted from the dataset.

parameters.name: num_keywords
parameters.description: Number of keywords per topic that is extracted from the dataset.

parameters.name: excluded_docs
parameters.description: List of document IDs that should be excluded from the analysis. Example, "docid1, docid2, ..., docidN"

get.description: Get summaries of topics that have been extracted from a dataset.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Dataset name.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Fulltext query, using mysql MATCH boolean query format. Example, ("word1" OR "word2") AND ("word3" OR "word4")

parameters.name: custom_stop_words
parameters.description: List of stop words

parameters.name: num_topics
parameters.description: Number of topics to be extracted from the dataset and summarized.

parameters.name: num_keywords
parameters.description: Number of keywords per topic that is extracted from the dataset.

parameters.name: summary_length
parameters.description: The maximum number of bullet points a user wants to see in each topic summary.

parameters.name: context_amount
parameters.description: The number of sentences surrounding key summary sentences in the documents that they come from.

parameters.name: num_docs
parameters.description: The maximum number of key documents to use for summarization.

parameters.name: excluded_docs
parameters.description: List of document IDs that should be excluded from the analysis. Example, "docid1, docid2, ..., docidN"

get.description: Get key topics from a given dataset.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Dataset name.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Fulltext query, using mysql MATCH boolean query format. Example, ("word1" OR "word2") AND ("word3" OR "word4")

parameters.name: custom_stop_words
parameters.description: List of stop words.

parameters.name: num_topics
parameters.description: Number of topics to be extracted from the dataset.

parameters.name: num_keywords
parameters.description: Number of keywords per topic that is extracted from the dataset.

parameters.name: metadata_selection
parameters.description: json object of {"metadata_field":["selected_values"]}

parameters.name: time_period
parameters.description: Time period selection

parameters.name: excluded_docs
parameters.description: List of document IDs that should be excluded from the analysis. Example, "docid1, docid2, ..., docidN"

post.description: Use this API to register a new user. Email and password are required, all other fields optional.

get.description: Use this API to authenticate. If the password is correct, returns the user details, including the user's api key.

parameters.name: user_email
parameters.description: Email of the user to authenticate.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Plaintext password of the user to authenticate.

info.title: Nucleus API
info.description: BETA version of the nucleus text analytics API.

user_email.description: Email of the user to register.

password.description: Password of the user to register.

first_name.description: First name of the user to register.'

last_name.description: Last name of the user to register.

phone.description: Phone number (int) of the user to register.

company.description: Name of the Company of the user.

language.description: If you want to override language detection.

success.description: Number of documents in the dataset

num_documents.description: Number of documents in the dataset

docid.description: ID of the document to be deleted.

keywords_weight.description: Weight of keywords in each topic

strength.description: Prevalence of each topic in the dataset

doc_topic_exposure.description: Exposure of each doc of the dataset to each topic

sourceid.description: The ID of the document the sentence comes from

ParseError.description: When a mask can't be parsed

MaskError.description: When any error occurs on mask
